name: PIGMENTUM
description: PIGMENTUM - is a fast and simple geometric non-stop game with elements of minimalist . You have only one life and the ability to change the color of the main character.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0a Storage: 140 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.7 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM
